00038 public class SmartMenuOverlayView extends GestureOverlayView implements OnGesturePerformedListener {
00039         // These two values will be modified according to the layout size...
00040         protected static int sCenterRadius = 32;
00041         protected static int sBranchesLength = 24;
00042         // ...but not this one
00043         protected static int sBranchesRadius = 24;
00044         
00045         // Edit these to change the drawing speed
00046         protected static int sCircleSpeed = 30;
00047         protected static int sLineSpeed = 10;
00048         
00049         // These values will be modified according to the layout size and orientation
00050         protected static int sLabelMargin = 10;
00051         protected static int sLabelHeight = 50;
00052         protected static int sLabelWidth = 200;
00053         protected static int sLabelFont = 30;
00054         
00055         // Make these static to compute them only once
00056         protected static final double RAD_45 = Math.PI/4;
00057         protected static final double COS_45 = Math.cos(RAD_45);
00058         protected static final double SIN_45 = Math.sin(RAD_45);
00059         
00060         private SmartMenuCircleView     mCircleView;
00061         private GestureLibrary          mLibrary;

00067                 super(context);
00068                 init(context);
00069         }

00076                 super(context, attributes);
00077                 init(context);

00084         private void init(Context context) {
00085                 mCircleView = new SmartMenuCircleView(context, this);
00086                 mCircleView.setVisibility(INVISIBLE);
00087                 addView(mCircleView);
00088                 
00089                 addOnGesturePerformedListener(this);
00090         }

00177         public void open(boolean animate) {
00178                 bringChildToFront(mCircleView);
00179                 mCircleView.reset();
00180                 mCircleView.setVisibility(VISIBLE);
00181                 setGestureVisible(false);
00182                 setEventsInterceptionEnabled(false);
00183                 
00184                 // Skip the animation
00185                 if (!animate) {
00186                         mCircleView.setAnimationEnd();
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         
00193         public void close() {
00194                 mCircleView.close();
00195         }
00196         
00200         public boolean isOpened() {
00201                 return (mCircleView.getVisibility() == VISIBLE);
00202         }
00203 
00204         @Override
00205         public void onGesturePerformed(GestureOverlayView overlay, Gesture gesture) {
00206                 ArrayList<Prediction> predictions = mLibrary.recognize(gesture);
00207                 
00208                 // We want at least one prediction
00209                 if (predictions.size() > 0) {
00210                         Prediction prediction = predictions.get(0);
00211                         // We want at least some confidence in the result
00212                         if (prediction.score > 1.0) {
00213                                 open(true);
00214                         }
00215                 }
00216         }
00217         
00218         protected static class SmartMenuCircleView extends View {
00219                 private int mCenterX, mCenterY;
00220                 private int mCurrentAngle = 0;
00221                 private int mCurrentBranch = 0;
00222                 private int mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00223                 
00224                 private boolean                                 mComputedValues = false;
00225                 private Paint                                   mPainter;
00226                 private SmartMenuOverlayView    mParent;
00227                 private String                                  mText = null;
00228                 private Vector<SmartMenuItem>   mItems;
00229                 
00230                 public SmartMenuCircleView(Context context, SmartMenuOverlayView parent) {
00231                         super(context);
00232                         this.mParent = parent;
00233                         init();
00234                 }
00235                 
00236                 protected void init() {
00237                         setFocusable(true);
00238                         setFocusableInTouchMode(true);
00239                         
00240                         setBackgroundColor(Color.argb(200, 0, 0, 0));
00241                         // Init the painter, set parameters here
00242                         mPainter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00243                         mPainter.setStyle(Paint.Style.STROKE);
00244                         mPainter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00245                         mPainter.setStrokeWidth(3);
00246                         mPainter.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);
00247                         mItems = new Vector<SmartMenuItem>();
00248                 }
00249                 
00250                 protected void reset() {
00251                         mCurrentAngle = 0;
00252                         mCurrentBranch = 0;
00253                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00254                         mComputedValues = false;
00255                         setText(null);
00256                         requestFocus();
00257                 }
00258                 
00259                 protected void close() {
00260                         setVisibility(INVISIBLE);
00261                         mParent.clear(false);
00262                         mParent.setGestureVisible(true);
00263                         mParent.setEventsInterceptionEnabled(true);
00264                 }
00265                 
00266                 protected void setAnimationEnd() {
00267                         mCurrentAngle = 360;
00268                         mCurrentBranch = mItems.size();
00269                 }
00270                 
00271                 protected void addMenuItem(SmartMenuItem item) {
00272                         mItems.add(item);
00273                 }
00274                 
00275                 protected SmartMenuItem getMenuItem(int index) {
00276                         return mItems.get(index);
00277                 }
00278                 
00279                 protected boolean deleteMenuItem(SmartMenuItem item) {
00280                         return mItems.remove(item);
00281                 }
00282                 
00283                 protected void insertMenuItemAt(SmartMenuItem item, int index) {
00284                         mItems.insertElementAt(item, index);
00285                 }
00286                 
00287                 protected int indexOf(SmartMenuItem item) {
00288                         return mItems.indexOf(item);
00289                 }
00290                 
00291                 @Override
00292                 public boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) {
00293                         switch (event.getAction()) {
00294                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_DOWN:
00295                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_MOVE:
00296                                 boolean isInMenu = false;
00297                                 for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); i++) {
00298                                         int x = mItems.get(i).getX();
00299                                         int y = mItems.get(i).getY();
00300                                         
00301                                         if (Math.sqrt( (event.getX() - x)*(event.getX() - x) + (event.getY() - y) * (event.getY() - y) ) <= sBranchesRadius) {
00302                                                 if (getText() == null || getText().equals(mItems.get(i).getText())) {
00303                                                         setText(mItems.get(i).getText());
00304                                                         invalidate();
00305                                                 }
00306                                                 isInMenu = true;
00307                                         }
00308                                 }
00309                                 if (!isInMenu) {
00310                                         if (getText() != null) {
00311                                                 setText(null);
00312                                                 invalidate();
00313                                         }
00314                                 }
00315                                 break;
00316                         case MotionEvent.ACTION_UP:
00317                                 for (int i=0; i<mItems.size(); i++) {
00318                                         int x = mItems.get(i).getX();
00319                                         int y = mItems.get(i).getY();
00320                                         
00321                                         if (Math.sqrt( (event.getX() - x)*(event.getX() - x) + (event.getY() - y) * (event.getY() - y) ) <= sBranchesRadius) {
00322                                                 if (mItems.get(i).onItemSelected()) {
00323                                                         // Close the menu
00324                                                         close();
00325                                                 }
00326                                         }
00327                                 }
00328                                 break;
00329                         default:
00330                         }
00331                         return true;
00332                 }
00333                 
00334                 @Override
00335                 public boolean onKeyDown(int keyCode, KeyEvent event) {
00336                         if (keyCode == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BACK) {
00337                                 close();
00338                         }
00339                         return true;
00340                 }
00341 
00342                 @Override
00343                 public void onDraw(Canvas canvas) {
00344                         // Init global values
00345                         if (!mComputedValues) { // Do it only once until reset
00346                                 if (getMeasuredHeight() > 400) {
00347                                         sLabelHeight = 40;
00348                                         sLabelMargin = 10;
00349                                         sLabelFont = 30;
00350                                 } else {
00351                                         sLabelHeight = 20;
00352                                         sLabelMargin = 5;
00353                                         sLabelFont = 15;
00354                                 }
00355                                 
00356                                 if (getMeasuredWidth() > getMeasuredHeight()) {
00357                                         // Landscape
00358                                         sBranchesLength = sCenterRadius = getMeasuredHeight() / 4 - sBranchesRadius - 5;
00359                                         sLabelWidth = getMeasuredWidth()/2 - sCenterRadius * 2 - sBranchesRadius * 2 - sLabelMargin;
00360                                 } else {
00361                                         // Portrait
00362                                         sBranchesLength = sCenterRadius = getMeasuredWidth() / 4 - sBranchesRadius - 5;
00363                                         sLabelWidth = getMeasuredWidth() - 2 * sLabelMargin;
00364                                 }
00365                                 
00366                                 mCenterX = getMeasuredWidth() / 2 ;
00367                                 mCenterY = getMeasuredHeight() / 2 ;
00368                                 
00369                                 mComputedValues = true;
00370                         }
00371                         
00372                         // Draw the label only if necessary
00373                         if (mText != null && mText.length() > 0) {
00374                                 drawLabel(canvas, mText);
00375                         }
00376                         
00377                         // Draw the centered circle
00378                         canvas.drawArc(new RectF(mCenterX-sCenterRadius, mCenterY-sCenterRadius, mCenterX+sCenterRadius, mCenterY+sCenterRadius),
00379                                         -90, mCurrentAngle, false, mPainter);
00380                         
00381                         if (mCurrentAngle < 360) {
00382                                 mCurrentAngle += sCircleSpeed;
00383                                 invalidate();
00384                                 return;
00385                         } else {
00386                                 // End of circle, draw branches
00387                                 if (mItems.size() <= 4) {
00388                                         // Use positions 0, 2, 4, 6
00389                                         for (int i=0; i<mCurrentBranch; i++) {
00390                                                 drawBranch(canvas, i*2, sBranchesLength, mItems.get(i));
00391                                         }
00392                                         
00393                                         if (mCurrentBranch < mItems.size()) {
00394                                                 drawBranch(canvas, mCurrentBranch*2, mCurrentBranchLength, mItems.get(mCurrentBranch));
00395                                                 
00396                                                 if (mCurrentBranchLength >= sBranchesLength) {
00397                                                         // Go to the next branch
00398                                                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00399                                                         mCurrentBranch++;
00400                                                 } else {
00401                                                         mCurrentBranchLength += sLineSpeed;
00402                                                 }
00403                                                 invalidate();
00404                                                 return;
00405                                         } else {
00406                                                 // Ended
00407                                         }
00408                                 } else {
00409                                         // Use all positions
00410                                         for (int i=0; i<mCurrentBranch; i++) {
00411                                                 drawBranch(canvas, i, sBranchesLength, mItems.get(i));
00412                                         }
00413                                         
00414                                         if (mCurrentBranch < mItems.size()) {
00415                                                 drawBranch(canvas, mCurrentBranch, mCurrentBranchLength, mItems.get(mCurrentBranch));
00416                                                 
00417                                                 if (mCurrentBranchLength >= sBranchesLength) {
00418                                                         mCurrentBranchLength = 0;
00419                                                         mCurrentBranch++;
00420                                                 } else {
00421                                                         mCurrentBranchLength += sLineSpeed;
00422                                                 }
00423                                                 invalidate();
00424                                                 return;
00425                                         } else {
00426                                                 // Ended
00427                                         }
00428                                 }
00429                         }
00430                 }
00431                 
00432                 private void drawBranch(Canvas canvas, int position, int length, SmartMenuItem icon) {
00433                         float x1=0, x2=0, y1=0, y2=0, x3=0, y3=0;
00434                         switch (position) {
00435                         case 0:
00436                                 x1 = x2 = x3 = mCenterX;
00437                                 y1 = mCenterY - sCenterRadius;
00438                                 y2 = y1 - length;
00439                                 y3 = y2 - sBranchesRadius;
00440                                 break;
00441                         case 1:
00442                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX + COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00443                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY - SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00444                                 x2 = (float)(x1 + COS_45 * length);
00445                                 y2 = (float)(y1 - SIN_45 * length);
00446                                 x3 = (float)(x2 + COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00447                                 y3 = (float)(y2 - SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00448                                 break;
00449                         case 2:
00450                                 y1 = y2 = y3 = mCenterY;
00451                                 x1 = mCenterX + sCenterRadius;
00452                                 x2 = x1 + length;
00453                                 x3 = x2 + sBranchesRadius;
00454                                 break;
00455                         case 3:
00456                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX + COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00457                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY + SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00458                                 x2 = (float)(x1 + COS_45 * length);
00459                                 y2 = (float)(y1 + SIN_45 * length);
00460                                 x3 = (float)(x2 + COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00461                                 y3 = (float)(y2 + SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00462                                 break;
00463                         case 4:
00464                                 x1 = x2 = x3 = mCenterX;
00465                                 y1 = mCenterY + sCenterRadius;
00466                                 y2 = y1 + length;
00467                                 y3 = y2 + sBranchesRadius;
00468                                 break;
00469                         case 5:
00470                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX - COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00471                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY + SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00472                                 x2 = (float)(x1 - COS_45 * length);
00473                                 y2 = (float)(y1 + SIN_45 * length);
00474                                 x3 = (float)(x2 - COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00475                                 y3 = (float)(y2 + SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00476                                 break;
00477                         case 6:
00478                                 y1 = y2 = y3 = mCenterY;
00479                                 x1 = mCenterX - sCenterRadius;
00480                                 x2 = x1 - length;
00481                                 x3 = x2 - sBranchesRadius;
00482                                 break;
00483                         case 7:
00484                                 x1 = (float)(mCenterX - COS_45 * sCenterRadius);
00485                                 y1 = (float)(mCenterY - SIN_45 * sCenterRadius);
00486                                 x2 = (float)(x1 - COS_45 * length);
00487                                 y2 = (float)(y1 - SIN_45 * length);
00488                                 x3 = (float)(x2 - COS_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00489                                 y3 = (float)(y2 - SIN_45 * sBranchesRadius);
00490                                 break;
00491                         default:
00492                                 return;
00493                         }
00494                         
00495                         canvas.drawLine(x1, y1, x2, y2, mPainter);
00496                         // Draw the final circle
00497                         if (length >= sBranchesLength) {
00498                                 icon.setPosition((int)x3, (int)y3);
00499                                 canvas.drawBitmap(icon.getIcon(), x3 - sBranchesRadius, y3 - sBranchesRadius, mPainter);
00500                                 canvas.drawCircle(x3, y3, sBranchesRadius, mPainter);
00501                         }
00502                 }
00503         
00504                 public void drawLabel(Canvas canvas, String text) {
00505                         RectF rect = new RectF(sLabelMargin, sLabelMargin, sLabelMargin + sLabelWidth, sLabelMargin + sLabelHeight);
00506                         canvas.drawRoundRect(rect, 10, 10, mPainter);
00507                         Paint textPainter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00508                         textPainter.setTextAlign(Paint.Align.CENTER);
00509                         textPainter.setTextSize(sLabelFont);
00510                         textPainter.setColor(Color.WHITE);
00511                         canvas.drawText(mText, sLabelMargin + sLabelWidth/2, sLabelMargin*2 + sLabelHeight/2, textPainter);
00512                 }

00527         public static class SmartMenuItem {

00530                 // Position is used to test if the user is touching one of the elements

00616         public static class SmartMenuIconFactory {
00621                 public static Bitmap createRoundedBitmap(Bitmap input) {
00622                         // Create the mask
00623                         Bitmap mask = Bitmap.createBitmap(sBranchesRadius * 2, sBranchesRadius * 2, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
00624                         Canvas maskCanvas = new Canvas(mask);
00625                         maskCanvas.drawARGB(0, 255, 255, 255);
00626                         
00627                         // Draw the circle into the mask
00628                         Paint painter = new Paint(Paint.ANTI_ALIAS_FLAG);
00629                         painter.setStyle(Paint.Style.FILL);
00630                         painter.setColor(Color.argb(255, 0, 0, 0));
00631                         maskCanvas.drawCircle(sBranchesRadius, sBranchesRadius, sBranchesRadius, painter);
00632                         
00633                         // Copy only the central part from the bitmap
00634                         int beginX = input.getWidth() / 2 - sBranchesRadius;
00635                         int beginY = input.getHeight() / 2 - sBranchesRadius;
00636                         Bitmap temp = Bitmap.createBitmap(input, beginX, beginY, sBranchesRadius*2, sBranchesRadius*2);
00637                         Bitmap output = temp.copy(Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888, true);
00638                         // Apply the mask
00639                         for (int i=0; i<output.getWidth(); i++) {
00640                                 for (int j=0; j<output.getHeight(); j++) {
00641                                         int a = Color.alpha(mask.getPixel(i, j));
00642                                         if (a == 0)
00643                                                 output.setPixel(i, j, Color.argb(0, 255, 0, 0));
00644                                 }
00645                         }
00646                         
00647                         // Really needed ? Transparency doesn't work without this...
00648                         Bitmap newoutput = Bitmap.createBitmap(sBranchesRadius * 2, sBranchesRadius * 2, Bitmap.Config.ARGB_8888);
00649                         Canvas outputCanvas = new Canvas(newoutput);
00650                         outputCanvas.drawARGB(0, 255, 255, 255);
00651                         outputCanvas.drawBitmap(output, 0, 0, painter);
00652                         
00653                         return newoutput;
00654                 }
00655         }
